comment_list.author: Mark Geer
comment_list.comment: We went to the other KOTO restaurant in Hanoi during this holiday and it was excellent so when we heard there was another where we were staying next , we had to go. It's different and we went in the evening this time. However food was â€¦

comment_list.author: Martin
comment_list.comment: The food was good but nothing in particular what stands out. Nevertheless, you should definitely come to support the great cause of this organization. P.S.: Apparently, they are changing locations and moving to another building soon.

comment_list.author: Thuc Phan
comment_list.comment: Just wanted to try this place given its purpose.  Tried two different prefix courses. Some items were really good, but it wasn't consistent throughout.

comment_list.author: Jai Sula
comment_list.comment: A nice food selection, different than the Hanoi location. Everything was very tasty, reasonably priced and the staff gave me way more personal space than in Hanoi where you have 4-5 people constantly looking at you making it somewhat uncomfortable. Here it felt more cozy.

comment_list.author: Adam Nagler
comment_list.comment: This restaurant appears to be permanently closed. Itâ€™s a shame, as we loved the Hanoi location. The listing should be updated.

comment_list.author: nicola burrows
comment_list.comment: What a great place. Attentive service and delicious food. Cocktails were pretty good too. Highly recommend this restaurant ğŸ˜

comment_list.author: Commy The commie man

comment_list.author: Paul Elledge
comment_list.comment: Good food and excellent staff.  Our waiter was very sociable and his English was good.

comment_list.author: Yoonjung Choi
comment_list.comment: Certainly thia restaurant is the best in Ho Chi Min Da Kao area! I had meals here many times while I was staying, never disappointed me!

comment_list.author: Andreea Francu
comment_list.comment: We had the farewell dinner here on the last night of our Intrepid tour. KOTO is a learning restaurant, run by trainees who are employed and trained by the charity for work in the hospitality industry. The food is good and while it tends to â€¦

comment_list.author: Pieter Bakker
comment_list.comment: Good food in a setting with an excellent purpose

comment_list.author: Andrew Cho
comment_list.comment:
Excellent food, great pricing, great staff and the whole restaurant is neat.

On the top of it - this place is run to support at-risk people

comment_list.author: Raws Ledingham
comment_list.comment: Chef training place for street kids.. proper restaurant, not a McDonald's.. good effort.

comment_list.author: MarkÃ©ta SmolnÃ­kovÃ¡

The staff is very friendly and helpful and the environment is minimalistic and clean. They also offer 'experiment menues' which we plan to try very soon.

comment_list.author: Sarah W
comment_list.comment: Really nice place to end our intrepid tour for our final meal.

comment_list.author: JoÃ£o Jesus

comment_list.author: Leah Newman
comment_list.comment:
A great way to help support people into learning and becoming apart of the hospitality industry! 

The food and service was what you would expect from a top 4* restaurant in UK. 

The staff were very polite and welcoming and I got talking â€¦

KOTO Staff are professional and courteous 
And the food is 5 stars
I had seafood fried rice and pineapple 
Very delicious 
I highly recommend eating at KOTO whenever you are in Ho Chi Minh City

comment_list.author: David Fabb
comment_list.comment: Nice food and good service

comment_list.author: Mat Whittingstall
comment_list.comment: Excellent service. Excellent food. Great atmosphere and very worthwhile cause. Loved it!

comment_list.author: Matt Burton

comment_list.comment: I was intrigued by the high ratings of the restaurant and gave it a try. I was very disappointed. The staff and the space was nice but that's it. The food was mediocre for a supposedly serious and expensive restaurant. The positive reviews â€¦

comment_list.comment:
Know one, teach one.

comment_list.author: Hana C
comment_list.comment: Wide selection, good beer. The ambience is boring so it is only recommended for a group of good friends or with a date you can actually talk to ^^ food selection is limited and a portion is small, if you want eat, this is not a good choice. Just enjoy the beers

comment_list.author: Thomas Chan
comment_list.comment: It has a good selection of beers and a small selection of food dishes. The quality of the food is better than expected. The environment is nice and a bit romantic. It has been around for many years. A good place to meet up with close friends for a good beer.

comment_list.author: Peter Jackson
comment_list.comment: Good Belgian / German beer selection but pricey. Had an aged sour that was excellent

comment_list.author: Phuc Zhang
comment_list.comment: Wait too long if you order foods.

comment_list.author: Carey Zesiger
comment_list.comment: Nice selection of Belgian imported beers. Not much for atmosphere though. Also not cheap.

comment_list.author: Quynh Tran
comment_list.comment: Good place for couples

comment_list.author: Shane Burkle
